body.p: “The Lonely Shepherd” is a pseudo-romantic reflection of a prince on a white horse. An unbearably slow and fascinating motion creates a story of modern masculinity – it's expectations and reality.
What happens when dreams come true? Is gold all that shines?

Andris Kačanovskis has graduated the Choreography department of the Jāzeps Vītols Latvian Academy of Music (2002) and has participated in numerous festivals, masterclasses and workshops in Latvia and abroad.

From 2003 to 2012 he was a member of the Olga Zitluhina Dance Company (Latvia). As an independent artist he has participated in different artistic and dance education projects. The dance performance “Future Freak”, created in collaboration with Agate Bankava for Gertrudes Street Theatre (Latvia) has been nominated for the Latvian Dance Award 2017/2018 for the Best Contemporary Dance Production.
